summary: AN ORDINANCE Amending Ordinance 116714 which suspended operation of S.M.C. 4.20.315 and 4.20.320, which relates to compensation for eligible administrative, professional, and executive employees until September 8, 1993; and further suspends application of s.M.C. 4.20.315 and 4.20.320 and the accrual of executive leave and overtime thereunder during the interim; and providing for a possible retroactive reinstatement of executive leave benefits.
